original_title: Alaska and Beyond: Big and Small
overview: Alaska is an outpost for adventurers, for naturalists, and it tells a story of the natural world too. The abundance and diversity of Alaskan animal life is awe inspiring. In a place like Alaska there is plenty of room to grow â€“ and hide. From the lowly murderous mosquito to the impressive Bald Eagle, this is the big and the small of Alaskan beasts.
title: Alaska and Beyond: Big and Small
